R

REDUCT_BASE - Static variable in class com.cscguru.com.balance.Balance
Base armor value needed to achieve (although impossible) 100% damage reduction.
REDUCT_RATIO - Static variable in class com.cscguru.com.balance.Balance
This ratio gets multiplied by the player's level to determine how much armor the player needs for (although impossible) 100% damage reduction.
